title: Ignota's SCP-6255 Pixel Fanart
content:

[[image https://i.imgur.com/VjqyUkz.gif]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7038861006944193798?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6255 SCP-6255]
[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6255loop.mp4, 6255.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7038861006944193798?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6255 by Roundabouts
[[/<]]
-----
I know it was WATER spilled on Dr. White's phone but I felt like coffee would read better so I went with that. I also messed with the colors quite a bit for this. before deciding on them. Normally my stuff's got really unnatural hues but for this one this kinda more neutral/blueish palette ended up working well with the coffee and the sterile environment. 

Normally the articles I draw have at least an //undertone// of something upsetting(I mean. Minus 999 but that's an outlier!). This one's just kinda goofy. I like it! Sometimes it's nice to just have something kinda fun.

I do fully believe Dr. White deserved it, though. RIP to Dr. Warren. 
 
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
